content: Phase 2 Backend: Setup FastAPI with load_dotenv, MongoDB connection, /api prefix, healthcheck endpoint
Phase 2 Backend: Implement Auth endpoints (register, login, refresh, me) with JWT and email/password
Phase 2 Backend: Create MongoDB collections and models (users, plans, sections, research_packs, financial_models, compliance_reports, exports, subscriptions)
Phase 2 Backend: Implement serialize_doc helper for ObjectId/datetime JSON serialization
Phase 2 Backend: Build Research Agent module with ONS/Eurostat/Google Trends/SERP/Companies House integrations
Phase 2 Backend: Build Validation Agent with freshness, source validity, logic/outlier, completeness checks
Phase 2 Backend: Build Financial Engine with deterministic formulas from PRD v3
Phase 2 Backend: Build Plan Writer Agent with zero-hallucination prompt and citation enforcement
Phase 2 Backend: Build Compliance Agent with templates (UK_STARTUP_VISA, UK_INNOVATOR_VISA, UK_STARTUP_LOAN, INVESTOR_READY, GENERIC)
Phase 2 Backend: Create Multi-Agent Orchestrator endpoint POST /api/plans/{id}/generate with status polling
Phase 2 Backend: Implement all Plan endpoints (list, create, get, update, delete, duplicate, generate, status)
Phase 2 Backend: Implement Section endpoints (list, get, update, regenerate)
Phase 2 Backend: Implement Financial endpoints (get, patch inputs, recalc)
Phase 2 Backend: Implement Compliance endpoints (get, check, list templates)
Phase 2 Backend: Implement Export endpoints (create, list, download) with PDF generation using ReportLab
Phase 2 Backend: Implement Subscription endpoints (current, usage) with tier checking
Phase 2 Frontend: Get design guidelines from design_agent
Phase 2 Frontend: Build all pages (Home, Auth, Dashboard, Intake Wizard, Plan Editor, Financials, Compliance, Exports, Settings)
Phase 2 Frontend: Build all components (ChatSteps, SectionCard, RichTextEditor, CitationsList, AssumptionsForm, Charts, ComplianceChecklist, ExportModal, PaywallModal)
Phase 2 Frontend: Implement data layer with REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL + /api prefix, loading/error states, data-testid attributes
Phase 2: Lint backend with ruff and frontend with eslint
Phase 2: Run esbuild bundle check for frontend
Phase 2: End to End Testing using Testing Agent
Phase 2: Fix all issues found in testing and re-test until all tests pass
Phase 2: Verify all 8 app user stories are working correctly
